Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, reflecting years of expertise and innovation. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or operations. Given its importance to me, I am offering it to you at a special price of $12,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a competitive rate. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
